definition: emergency exit
highest/greatest/too (much)/very/extremely
surname Ping
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men

sentences.english: Step 6: If you cannot open the doors, look for an emergency exit window.
sentences.chinese: 如果无法打开紧急车门，则寻找太平门窗户。

sentences.english: We left by the rear exit.

sentences.chinese: 这家剧院有六个太平门。

sentences.english: All of them rushed for the exit as soon as they heard the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 听到报警器响他们都向太平门冲去。

sentences.english: Please locate the nearest emergency exit.
sentences.chinese: 请指明最靠近的太平门位置。

sentences.english: Thellos plane has eight emergency exits. Please locate the exit nearest to you.
sentences.chinese: 本架飞机有八个太平门，请找到离你这段的那个门。

sentences.english: When the film was over, they broke and moved towards the exits.
sentences.chinese: 电影放完时，他们散开后分别往各太平门而去。
